input.sentences: we got to the beach around morning .
we found a good spot near the life guard tower .
planes where flying above us as we relaxed .
a little bird came and tried to get food from me .
if you feed one | more always come .
output.sentences: The next morning I started at the beach agian.
There was the lifeguard tower spotted right in front of the hotel.
As I laid on the sand to relax I could see some planes flying.
The birds kept coming near me to steal my food.
I eventually gave in and fed them some of my food.
